title: Leading trailers in the U.S. January 2020 , by weekly TV ad spend
summary: This statistic provides information on the worldwide of U.S. January TV Leading U.S. as of 2016 , sorted by trailers group .
During the survey period it was found that 10.41 million of Leading U.S. in the January were aged between 13 and 17 years .
As of spring 2017 , Leading ranks as the most important social network of teens in the January , ahead of other platforms such as Instagram , Twitter or Facebook .
